entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SuperPMI replay failure: (unsigned)reg < ArrLen(regMasks) #93527
  • Revert workaround for C++ compiler bug #93526

Closed

  • [7.0] Multiple JIT failures in coreclr arm64 windows #93424
  • Add AVX/AVX512 to Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCase #92497

PullRequests

Created

  • Add GT_ARR_LEN to optNonNullAssertionProp_Ind #93531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Workaround for C++ compiler bug on Arm64 #93530
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Workaround for C++ compiler bug on Arm64 #93529
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Workaround for C++ compiler bug on Arm64 #93528
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete outdated workaround #93525
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Allows CustomAttribute table to be unsorted in EnC delta #93524
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, needs-author-action

Merged

  • Workaround for #93442 #93523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCase_Vector with AVX2 and AVX512 #93116
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix CodeGen::instGen_Set_Reg_To_Imm #93411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Provide System.DirectoryServices.Protocols package readme #93518
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize constant range tests #93521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make FailFast blocks cold (GS cookies) #93429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
